resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103564</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103564</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201848</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Act Up, Butt Out </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tat Oben, Stoßen Heraus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Acte Vers le haut, Aboutent Dehors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Ato Acima, Butt Para fora</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Atto In su, Confina Fuori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νόμος επάνω, άκρη έξω</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Acto Para arriba, Empalma Hacia fuera</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students play the role of smokers, "social smokers" and smokers trying to quit, to better understand the pressures faced by each.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer spielen die Rolle der Raucher, 
"Sozialraucher" und die Raucher, die versuchen zu beenden, den Druck 
besser zu verstehen, der durch jedes gegenübergestellt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants jouent le rôle des fumeurs, "les 
fumeurs sociaux" et les fumeurs essayant de quitter, pour comprendre 
mieux les pressions faites face par chacun.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes jogam o papel dos smokers, "smokers
sociais" e smokers que tentam parar, para compreender mais melhor as 
pressões enfrentadas por cada um.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi svolgono il ruolo dei fumatori, 
"fumatori sociali" e fumatori che provano a rinunciare, capire più 
meglio le pressioni affrontate da ciascuno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές διαδραματίζουν το ρόλο των καπνιστών, 
"κοινωνικοί καπνιστέσ" και καπνιστές που προσπαθούν να 
εγκαταλείψουν, για να καταλάβουν καλύτερα τις πιέσεις που 
αντιμετωπίζονται από κάθε μια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes desempeñan el papel de 
fumadores, los "fumadores sociales" y los fumadores que intentan 
salir, entender mejor las presiones hechas frente por cada uno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201848</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Free to use or adapt for educational purposes only</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103564</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/act-up-butt-out</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
